data.text: Yamaan naxan sigan tima dimini,
Ala i bata yamaan nawuya ayi,
Amasɔtɔ i ya yamaan tɔrɔma goron tongo wudin naxan bun
Yaxune sankidin naxanye
Amasɔtɔ diina nde bata bari en xa,
A mangayaan nun bɔɲɛ xunbenla
Marigin bata falan ti Yaxuba bɔnsɔnna xili ma,
Yamaan birin a kolonma nɛn.
“Yinna bitikidine bata bira,9.9 Bitikidin mɔn falama yirena nde yi fa fala “Birikidina.”

Nayi, Alatala Asiriya kaane radinma nɛn Isirayila kaane ma, Manga Resin9.10 Arami kaane mangan nan Resin na. Asiriya kaane nan Manga Resin yaxune ra. Na feen sɛbɛxi Mangane Firinden 16.8-9 kui. yɛngɛfane.
Arami kaan naxanye sogeteden binni,
Nayi, Alatala bata a yamaan ɲaxankata,
Nayi, Alatala Isirayila yamanan birin naxɔrima nɛn
Fonne nun kuntigine nan a xunna ra,
Yamani ito yɛɛratine nan e ralɔma ayi,
Nanara, Marigin mi sɛwaxi a foningene ra,
Ɲaxuyaan muxune ganma yati,
Alatala Sɛnbɛn Birin Kanna xɔlɔ gbeen
Muxune donseen tongoma yiifanna ma,
Manase bɔnsɔnna baloma Efirami bɔnsɔnna ra,
